toggle_long_press_to_reorder_widgets: Kunna/A kashe dogon latsa don sake yin odar widget din

$ai_chat.intro: Sannu! Ni ne AI na yankinku. Ta yaya zan iya taimaka muku?
$ai_chat.download_title: Sauke fayil ɗin LLM da ake buƙata:
$ai_chat.teaser_description: Yi amfani da ƙarfin Generative AI akan kayan aikinka. Yi hira, rubuta lambar sirri, ko gina ingantattun na'urori masu sarrafa kansu tare da tsaron tsarin gida da na sirri.
$ai_chat.feat_offline: Da sauri da kuma na gida
$ai_chat.loading_model: Ana loda samfurin zuwa ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya... Wannan na iya ɗaukar ɗan lokaci.
